simple.title: Simple
simple.subtitle: It's so <bold>simple</bold> that you already know how to use it.

private.title: Private
private.subtitle: Your messages are strongly <bold>encrypted</bold> and can be self-destructed

sync.title: Sync
sync.subtitle: Allows you to access your chats from <bold>multiple</bold> devices.

fast.title: Fast
fast.subtitle: Delivers messages <bold>faster</bold> than any other application.

powerful.title: Powerful
powerful.subtitle: Has no limits for the <bold>size</bold> of your multimedia and chats.

open.title: Open
open.subtitle: Has an API and source code <bold>available</bold> to everyone.

safe.title: Safe
safe.subtitle: Keeps your messages <bold>safe</bold> from hacker attacks.

social.title: Social
social.subtitle: Your groups allow up to <bold>200,000</bold> members.

expressive.title: Expressive
expressive.subtitle: Allows you to <bold>personalize</bold> your application completely.
